patthana11.16:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.
patthana11.16:2.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.
patthana11.16:3.1: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana11.16:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana11.16:5.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana11.16:6.1: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana11.16:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana11.16:8.1: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana11.16:9.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
